setBeep

public void setBeep(int dur,
                    int freq,
                    int cycle)
Set the beep parameters.

Parameters:
dur - duration of the beep in milliseconds in multiples of 10 up to 2550
freq - frequency of the beep in Hz up to 65535
cycle - duty cycle of the beep (0-100%)
